0.0.5.en: honk, window state, descriptions and repair view

0.0.6.en: extended climate device, changed existign flow actions

0.0.8.en: fixed house number, added charge port and start/stop charging

0.0.9.en: Added Tesla Vehicle Commands protocol (end-2-end encrypted commands). Added API error trigger card.

0.0.10.en: Fixed location trigger. Added steering wheel / seat heating

0.0.12.en: Changed proxy URL. Changed capability order in device definition

0.0.15.en: Fixed translations. Added software update state. Set state to offline in case of http-408. Moved power capability to battery device.

0.0.16.en: Added command retry to car settings.

0.0.19.en: Redesign for capabilities & flows. Added CommandApi

1.0.1.en: Capability changes in battery device. New 'Software available' trigger. New charging state 'connected' condition. New direct commands.

1.0.4.en: Added Homey energy settings to battery device. Prepare for permission update.

1.1.0.en: Added new permnmission [homey:manager:geolocation], Added GoogleMaps long URL check.

1.1.2.en: Added location based power (Homey energy). Fixed shift state. Added shift state condition.

1.1.3.en: Fixed Homey energy (W instead of kW)

1.1.4.en: Extended GoogleURL check. Added yes/no conditions.

1.1.6.en: Optimized online/offline state check. Fixed schedule charging/departure flow actions.

1.1.7.en: Added front/rear trunk control. Fixed location settings.

1.1.8.en: Fixed interval. Force REST API for navigation (location/GPS) flows. Translations.

1.1.9.en: Changed/optimized interval handling Updated location reached/left trigger. Changed door button to appear dark if locked.

1.1.11.en: Added unit support fÃ¼r distance, temperature, pressure.

1.1.13.en: Added app registration check for signed commands.

1.1.14.en: Fixed app registration check for signed commands. Fixed translations

1.1.15.en: Added media device. Fixed app registration check (Tesla API bug).

1.2.0.en: Version update (publish live version including all changes since 1.1.5).

1.2.1.en: Added media next/prev favorite flow action. Update charging state on charge action.

1.2.2.en: Fix stop sync after device got deleted.

1.2.4.en: Added timeline hint for unpaired cars. Updated pair/registration screen.

1.2.7.en: Added API error whitelist, starting with 'already_set'.

1.2.8.en: Added API error whitelist, starting with 'already_set'.

1.2.10.en: Added flow action for simple steering wheal heating on/off. Extended API error whitelist: 'is_charging'.

1.3.0.en: Added charging history (battery device, repair view). Added charged energy meter (battery device).

1.3.2.en: Changed distance to home to km.

1.3.3.en: Added 'Navigate to SuC' flow card (location device).

1.3.4.en: Added 'nearest SuC' list to location repair view.

1.3.5.en: Added 'nearest Destination Charger' list to location repair view.

1.4.0.en: Version update (publish live version including all changes since 1.3.0).

1.4.1.en: Added car state check before sending commands.

1.4.2.en: Added user presence for car device (flow trigger and condition).

1.4.3.en: Added rate limit and app version check for proxy commands.

1.4.4.en: Added rate limit and app version check for proxy commands.

1.5.0.en: Version update (publish live version including all changes since 1.4.1).

1.5.1.en: Added insights and flows for rate limit usage. Changed location request: requested if a location device is present.

1.5.2.en: Force IPv4 instead of IPv6 in auth process.

1.5.4.en: Added climate keeper mode. Force IPv4 instead of IPv6 for command proxy.

1.5.5.en: Force IPv4 instead of IPv6 for command proxy.

1.5.6.en: Added device tile state. Devices are shown inactive if car is offline/asleep.

1.6.0.en: Version update (publish live version including all changes since 1.5.1).

1.6.1.en: Fixed location flow condition 'Is on the way'.

1.7.0.en: Optimized API usage to reduce rate limit risk.

1.7.3.en: Added flow action to set online interval.

1.8.0.en: Translation update, added languages: fr it sv no es da ru pl. Fixed door lock/unlock flow cards.

1.8.1.en: Added flow trigger for charging history entry.

1.9.0.en: Added trip history for location device (repair view) including flow trigger.

1.9.2.en: Fixed data update for missing location device.

1.9.3.en: Simplified rate limit information (car device settings).

1.9.5.en: Error checking for invalid API data.

1.9.6.en: Added charge commands count and rate limit information.

1.9.8.en: Added wake commands count and rate limit information.

1.10.0.en: Added active route data to location device (destination, address, time, distance, energy).

1.11.2.en: Extended widget. Clear destination data if no route is found.

1.11.3.en: Widget: hide elements if device is not found.

1.11.6.en: Added raw car data to repair view.

1.11.9.en: Route trigger sequence changed. NL translation changed for API count flow cards.

2.0.0.en: New version for personal FleetAPI support with own Tesla app credentials.

2.0.2.en: Added commands: start/stop chagrging; set charging ampere.

2.0.3.en: Added climate commands: vent, temperature, preconditioning, defrost, overheat protection.

2.0.7.en: Reemoved rate limit data. Changed api counter to reeset at 0:00 local time.

2.0.13.en: Temporary fix for CPU limit issue.
